amendment.description: To provide that, or the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title IV for the Army for research, development, test and evaluation, up to $10,000,000 may be available for the Combat Support Hospital - Mobile Support Hospital.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4846 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4846 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S8703-8705) To provide that, or the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by title IV for the Army for research, development, test and evaluation, up to $10,000,000 may be available for the Combat Support Hospital - Mobile Support Hospital.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4846 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Pryor.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4846 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
